meanings.definition: A type of chair with side panels extending from the back to the armrests.
meanings.sent1: The cozy wingchair in the living room was perfect for reading.
meanings.sent2: She sat comfortably in the wingchair by the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the wingchair was a great place to hide its toys.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts soared like a bird perched on a wingchair.
meanings.sent5: The elegant wingchair added a touch of sophistication to the room.

meanings.definition: To furnish or provide with a wingchair.
meanings.sent1: He decided to wingchair the study room for a more classic look.
meanings.sent2: They wingchaired the office with matching furniture.
meanings.sent3: The idea to wingchair the entire house amused everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity wingchaired the room into a cozy retreat.
meanings.sent5: The designer wingchaired the space beautifully, impressing all visitors.
